TransactionStateContext.RewardSettingState: When the owner sets the reward by calling setReward and transfers ETH to the contract
TransactionStateContext.RewardClaimingState: When a user claims the reward by calling claimReward with a valid submission

ExternalInteractions: The contract transfers ETH to the owner when setReward is called by the owner.
The contract transfers ETH to a user when claimReward is called by the user.
